mapper.select:
select a.DOCNUMBER as "ID" ,-- 唯一主键 b.inhosno as "ZYID" ,--住院号 b.INTIMES as "VisitId" ,--住院次数 b.PATIENTID as "PatientId" ,--病例号 a.CREATETIME as "EnterDate" , --记录日期 a.UPDATETIME as "UpdTime" ,--更新日期 decode(a.DTYPE,'1','住院病历','2','门诊病历','3','门诊留观病历') as "CaseClass" ,--病历分类 a.DOCNUMBER as "BcCode" ,--病历记录编号 a.DOCNAME as "BcName" ,--病历记录名称 c.content||','||d.content||','||e.content as "CourseContent" --病历内容 from ipr_inpatientinfo b,EMR_DOCUMENT a left join EMR_RESOURCES c on a.RID_HEADER=c.rid left join EMR_RESOURCES d on a.RID_BODY=d.rid left join EMR_RESOURCES e on a.RID_FOOTER=e.rid where a.orgcode =b.orgcode and a.REGISTERNO=b.inid and a.orgcode =#{map.OrgCode} and b.inhosno=#{map.ID} and a.CREATETIME >=to_date(#{map.StartDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.CREATETIME <=to_date(#{map.EndDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
